00031 void Hyperspace::Util::normalize_pathname(std::string name, std::string &normal_name) {
00032   normal_name = "";
00033   if (name[0] != '/')
00034     normal_name += "/";
00035 
00036   if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == std::string::npos)
00037     normal_name += name;
00038   else
00039     normal_name += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00040 }
00041 
00042 uint64_t Hyperspace::Util::get_handle(std::string name) {
00043   std::string normal_name;
00044 
00045   normalize_pathname(name, normal_name);
00046 
00047   Global::FileMap::iterator iter = Global::file_map.find(normal_name);
00048   if (iter == Global::file_map.end())
00049     HT_THROWF(Error::PARSE_ERROR, "Unable to find '%s' in open file map", normal_name.c_str());
00050 
00051   return (*iter).second;
00052 }
